content: my upcycled puff crochet hat is now available as a free crochet pattern i made this project as part of the #hobbiiupcycledalpacablend yarn campaign hobbii yarn invited me to participate in this campaign and provided the yarn for this project crocheted from a warm wool blend yarn this one-of-a-kind accessory showcases delightful puff stitches and is created bottom-up in a single piece now you can make your own stylish statement using just one ball of upcycled alpaca blend yarn this hat is a fitted beanie if you d like it to be a slouch hat you can increase the repeat row to add extra height > this pattern is available for free on > my blog which is monetized by ads if > you prefer an ad-free version of the > pattern it is available to purchase > right here on ravelry ♥ rhondda instagram https //www instagram com/oombawkadesigncrochet/ instagram reels https //www instagram com/oombawkadesigncrochet/reels/ tiktok https //www tiktok com/@oombawkadesigncrochet pinterest https //www pinterest com/oombawkadesigncrochet/ youtube https //www youtube com/oombawkadesigncrochet facebook https //www facebook com/oombawkadesigncrochet/ newsletter https //oombawkadesigncrochet com/crochet-newsletter © 2012-2024 designed by rhondda mol oombawka design crochet all rights reserved you may sell finished items you crochet from this pattern no part of this publication may be reproduced altered or distributed in any form or by any means without express written permission from rhondda mol
